data.title: Hugh P | Function Central
data.meta_description: Proficient acoustic guitarist and vocalist from London performing well-known rock, jazz, latin and soul covers, perfect for receptions, dinners and parties. Also available as a duo with saxophone, and as a Cuban duo or trio with congas/cajon!
data.text:
from£250

This is the act's lowest available price for a local performance by their smallest line-up. It does not include any travel costs.

Please note that many acts charge higher rates for events taking place on Fridays and Saturdays in summer.

Occasionally, a rate lower than the listed price may be obtainable on selected dates. This will be advertised in the act's "about" section.

Hugh performs background music. Never over-powering, his soft, silky vocals The sheer amount of venues he has played demonstrate just how in demand he really is!

Hugh has performed as an in-house musician in venues such as Viva Viva Crouch End, Number Ten Ladbroke Grove, Prince Regent Kensington, Trafalgar Square Hilton, Eight Members Club, Lost Angel Battersea, La Gondola in Battersea, River Lounge Tower Bridge, Revolution Bank, Brixton Dogstar, Gold Coast Brixton, China White West End, Gaucho Hampstead, Gaucho Piccadilly and Wyndham Grand Chelsea, and also playing one-offs in many top venues such as Claridges, Hyatt Regency, omo’s and Light Bar.

In addition to boasting a long list of weddings and private parties, and corporate functions for companies such as Microsoft, and private art exhibitions for artists like Banksy.

Along with his soul band, Hugh has played at nightclubs across London, like Sound, Infinity Club, and Dingwalls, and held residencies at Mass and China White. His previous releases have been acknowledged by prominent international DJs, including Chris Phillips (Choice FM), Patrick Forge (Kiss FM), Dom Servini (Straight No Chaser/Wah Wah 45s) and Michael Rutten (Compost/Soulsearching) and a whole lot more, many have been praised as ‘future classics’.

Hugh offers the option of a cuban trio featuring a saxophonist who has shared the stage with Incognito, Donna Summer and Mr Dynamite and James Brown, and a Cuban percussionist from who has performed with Buena Vista frontman Ibrahim Ferrer, Brazilian great Djavan and pop stars like the Game. Their cuban set is guaranteed dance music and, with the guys swapping instruments, it's like having two bands for the price of one!

“Hugh played our songs beautifully. He contacted us weeks in advance and responded promptly each time we had other queries. He exceeded expectations by learning our wedding music medley. Hugh was also very cheerful and friendly to our guests.”

Leores, Wedding at Eastbury Manor House in Essex, October 2022

“Prior to commencing his set; Hugh and I had a conversation and it was an absolute pleasure getting to know him. He was extremely polite and made us feel at ease immediately. Hugh's performance was raved about by all of the guests that we have spoken to since our wedding and if ever my wife and I host another event we will most defiantly be using Hugh. Also, should any of our friend and family require an artist for any future events we will be more than happy to recommend Hugh. Thank you so much for helping make our day so special; I hope that your future in the music industry is as bright and special as your personality. Thanks again and all the best.”

Clayton & Cat, Wedding, Conwy, September 2022

“Hugh was exactly what we needed for our end of season ball - great music, great vibe and loved by everyone! An artist that suited all ages and was easy to work with. We will be using him in the future for sure!”

Corinna, Ball, Essex, May 2022

“Hugh was a true professional who has amazing talent. His performance was outstanding and we would not hesitate to recommend him. At one point, one of our guests thought that we had a Jack Johnson CD playing. They didn't believe that it was a live act. They thought that Hugh's voice was fantastic. Hugh really did make our wedding extra special so thank you.”

Christine and Ben, Wedding, March 2022

“Hugh was brilliant. He did exactly as we asked and was incredibly flexible with the many requests we had. Many guests commented on how the excellent music added to the ambience. I would highly recommend this lovely artist to any event. Thanks so much for adding your charm to our day and making it incredible xxx”

Gen & Scott, Wedding at Sacred Heart Catholic Church, August 2021
